title: Preparing for R3BIRTH’s Live Concert
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Tomorrow is finally R3BIRTH’s live concert!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! I’m so excited and fired up that my eyes are wide open!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Same! But if we get too excited today, won’t we be too tired tomorrow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re right......! Ugh, what should we do~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then, Kana-chan, why don’t we have a sleepover tonight? I’ll make us my tasty, special hot milk before we sleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Really!? Thanks, Ai-chan! Okay, then I’ll make us a delicious breakfast!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yay! I’m excited to try your breakfast, Kana-chan! I bet your breakfast is going to break my morning fatigue super fast! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ahaha, I hope so. Well then, why don’t we head home early and get ready for tomorrow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sure! Let’s make sure we’re fully energized so we can give them our full support!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright, we’re gonna get lots of sleep~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
